articles.description: RANVIR SINGH has caused a stir on Twitter today, after the Strictly Come Dancing star's ensemble left viewers concerned as she took over Lorraine Kelly's presenting duties.

articles.title: Has Prince Harry transformed his royal accent for the new podcast? - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Eyebrows were raised at his newly-adopted style of speech, as heard on his and the Duchess of Sussex’s latest podcast
articles.content: One of the pleasures of Tier 3 has been rewatching all three series of The Windsors, Channel 4s wickedly irreverent parody of the Royal Family. The performances  of Haydn Gwynne as a Cruella de Vil-l… [+2409 chars]

articles.author: Bethany Minelle
articles.title: Elliot Page thanks fans for 'love and support' after coming out as transgender - Sky News
articles.description: The Umbrella Academy star says positive messages from fans are "the greatest gift" and urges people to "be there for each other".

articles.author: Jennifer Smith, Laura Collins
articles.title: Ex-Bloomberg reporter reveals she quit her job left husband for infamous jailed Martin Shkreli - Daily Mail
articles.description: A former Bloomberg News reporter quit her job, divorced her husband, and froze her eggs for imprisoned former CEO Martin Shkreli. Christie Smythe, 38, is now being ignored by Shkreli, 37.
articles.content: A former Bloomberg  journalist who quit her job and left her husband to be with 'Pharma Bro' Martin Shkreli, despite him being in prison until 2023, after falling in love with him while covering his … [+13851 chars]
